class.name: Weather
class.author: Alex Mead and Edward A. Lee

input.name: longitude
input.description: The longitude of a location (default is Berkeley).

input.name: latitude
input.description: The latitude of a location (default is Berkeley).

output.name: name
output.description: Name of the location (nearest city name).

output.name: pressure
output.description: Pressure in hectopascals (hPa), where 1 hPa is 100 pascals.

output.name: windDirection
output.description: Wind source direction (in degrees, relative to north).

class.description: This accessor, when fired, reads the current weather data from openweathermap.org.
